Title: Pinjar
Writer: Chandra Prakash Dwivedi (additional dialogue), Chandra Prakash Dwivedi (screenplay), Amrita Pritam (dialogue), Amrita Pritam (novel), Amrita Pritam (story)
Actors: Urmila Matondkar, Manoj Bajpayee, Sanjay Suri, Sandali Sinha
Plot: In the days leading up to Partition, a Hindu woman is abducted by a Muslim man. Soon, she finds herself not only forced into marriage, but living in a new country as the borders between India and Pakistan are drawn.
